statements: SELECT * FROM robots_energy_efficiency;
SELECT robot_id, energy_consumption FROM robots_energy_efficiency WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8;
SELECT efficiency_rating, energy_consumption FROM robots_energy_efficiency ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM robots_energy_efficiency WHERE efficiency_rating < 0.5 ORDER BY efficiency_rating ASC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_energy_consumption FROM robots_energy_efficiency;
SELECT * FROM robots_energy_efficiency WHERE energy_consumption > 50 ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC, robot_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT robot_id, energy_consumption FROM robots_energy_efficiency WHERE efficiency_rating BETWEEN 0.7 AND 0.9 ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC
SELECT robot_id, efficiency_rating, energy_consumption FROM robots_energy_efficiency WHERE energy_consumption < 30 AND efficiency_rating > 0.5 ORDER BY energy_consumption ASC, efficiency_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM robots_energy_efficiency WHERE efficiency_rating < 0.5 OR energy_consumption >= 100 ORDER BY efficiency_rating ASC, energy_consumption DESC
SELECT efficiency_rating, AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_energy_consumption FROM robots_energy_efficiency GROUP BY efficiency_rating ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT robot_name, energy_consumption FROM robots ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT robot_name, efficiency FROM robots WHERE energy_consumption > 50;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, robot_name FROM tasks JOIN robots ON tasks.robot_id = robots.robot_id;
SELECT * FROM robots WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY efficiency DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT robot_name, SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_energy FROM robots GROUP BY robot_name HAVING total_energy < 1000;
SELECT robot_name, task_name, start_time, end_time FROM robots JOIN tasks ON robots.robot_id = tasks.robot_id WHERE efficiency > 80 ORDER BY start_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT robot_id, task_name FROM tasks WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY task_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT robot_id, AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_energy_consumption FROM robots GROUP BY robot_id HAVING avg_energy_consumption < 50;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT robot_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT robot_id, efficiency_rating FROM robot_efficiency ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturing_date FROM robot_details ORDER BY manufacturing_date;
SELECT robot_id, energy_consumed, timestamp FROM energy_consumption WHERE robot_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM robot_details WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT robot_name, efficiency_rating FROM robot_details JOIN robot_efficiency ON robot_details.robot_id = robot_efficiency.robot_id WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8;

SELECT robot_details.robot_name, robot_efficiency.efficiency_rating, energy_consumed FROM robot_details JOIN robot_efficiency ON robot_details.robot_id = robot_efficiency.robot_id JOIN energy_consumption ON robot_details.robot_id = energy_consumption.robot_id WHERE energy_consumed > 100 AND manufacturing_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT robot_name, energy_source, energy_consumed FROM robot_details JOIN energy_consumption ON robot_details.robot_id = energy_consumption.robot_id WHERE energy_source LIKE '%battery%' ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT robot_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY robot_id ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT robot_id, datetime, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY datetime DESC;
SELECT robot_id, efficiency_rating, efficiency_date FROM energy_efficiency WHERE efficiency_rating > 80;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer, production_year FROM robot_details WHERE production_year >= 2010;
SELECT robot_id, usage_type, start_date, end_date FROM robot_usage WHERE usage_type = 'Industrial' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY datetime DESC
SELECT robot_id, efficiency_rating FROM energy_efficiency WHERE efficiency_rating >= 4 ORDER BY efficiency_date ASC
SELECT model_name, manufacturer, weight FROM robot_details WHERE production_year < 2010
SELECT robot_id, usage_type, start_date, end_date FROM robot_usage WHERE end_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ec JOIN robot_details rd ON ec.robot_id = rd.robot_id WHERE ec.energy_consumed > 50 ORDER BY rd.length DESC
SELECT * FROM Robots ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, model FROM Robots WHERE energy_consumption > 50;
SELECT robot_id, location, power_consumption FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT id, timestamp, action FROM WorkLogs WHERE robot_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT robot_id, timestamp, efficiency FROM EfficiencyHistory WHERE efficiency < 0.8;
SELECT * FROM Robots ORDER BY name DESC, energy_consumption ASC;
SELECT name, model, efficiency FROM Robots WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT Sensors.sensor_type, Robots.name FROM Sensors JOIN Robots ON Sensors.robot_id = Robots.id WHERE Sensors.power_consumption < 50;
SELECT WorkLogs.timestamp, WorkLogs.action, Robots.name FROM WorkLogs JOIN Robots ON WorkLogs.robot_id = Robots.id WHERE WorkLogs.action LIKE '%maintenance%' ORDER BY WorkLogs.timestamp DESC;

SELECT MaintenanceLogs.issue, Robots.name, EfficiencyHistory.efficiency FROM MaintenanceLogs JOIN Robots ON MaintenanceLogs.robot_id = Robots.id JOIN EfficiencyHistory ON MaintenanceLogs.robot_id = EfficiencyHistory.robot_id WHERE EfficiencyHistory.efficiency > 90;
